content:
addRule()
	.when(Project.dependsOnArtifact(org.jboss.windup.project.condition.Artifact@51632f2e)
)
	.perform(Iteration.over(?).as(dependency_instance).when(Not.any(org.jboss.windup
			.reporting.config.HasHint@25e71d2f)).perform(Hint
			.titled("Spring component {artifact} requires investigation").withText("
                                Check if there is a Quarkus Extensions with Spri
			ng API compatibility for the Spring `{artifact}` component.  
                                If yes, then replace the `{group}:{artifact}` de
			pendency with the Quarkus extension.  
                                If no, consider rewrite the code that relies on 
			this dependency leveraging the Quarkus Guides linked below.
                                ").withEffort(5).with([Link.to(https://quarkus
			.io/guides/).titled(Quarkus - Guides)]))
)
withId("springboot-generic-catchall-groovy-00000")
